responses: The branch criteria for iit mandi is the one which allows 50% branch change with minimum strength of 20 in priority of cgpa of students in a branch pls refer to the official link below for more details
the academic calender has two semester in a year with vacation between each semester of about 2 months apart from usual holiday on festivals and other events
IIT mandi is equipped with full capacity labs in each and every sector loctaed in both the campus refer to link below to see more details

IIT mandi has been very promotive in creating a start up friendly environment headed by IIT mandi catalyst which incubates and provides platform for an individual to get going. A new startup ,refer to the link below for more details
Hostel room in iit mandi has capacity of all sizes from 1-3 all the rooms are equipped with essential commodities like bed tables cupboards windows overall the room is very spacious and illuminated
all the electonic gadgets like kettle , induction and iron press are available to each floors of every hostel
each hostel is equipepd with common washing machines
the hostel is generally a two floor building with appropriate room size from 1-3 with all commodities like bed table and cupboard
the washroom is common to each floor with multiple bathing and toilet facilities its sanity is ensured every day and within just a mention the issue related to washrooms are settled on spot
pls refer to below link for more details
each floor has balcony and each room is equipped with windows
security has been ensured at each step from election attendance to prohibition of anyone to enter hostel rooms include these

each and every corner of the hostel is equipped with very high speed wifi details of which will be shared as soon as one is allocated a room apart from these common rooms at each floor has lan cables for very very internet speed and extensive usagss
